title: cmd/vet: doc.go missing details for struct tags check
body:
The body for the struct tags check section is [missing from doc.go](
https://github.com/golang/go/blob/7ea62121a7/src/cmd/vet/doc.go#L140-L142
), causing godoc to render the following heading as a non-heading:

![screen shot 2016-09-15 at 10 22 06 am](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/290647/18559943/5b5f91c2-7b2e-11e6-9a88-9d9d018d63b0.png)
